nodes.text: Nerf nuggets was a dish using made using the meat of a nerf. It could be eaten with Corellian buckwheat noodles. The Coruscant Underworld bar Urrett's Marque served fried nerf nuggets, and the Wookiee Chewbacca ordered some when he visited the bar with Han Solo hoping to find a smuggling job. Solo found the dish unpleasant, and questioned how Chewbacca could eat them.

Around 0 ABY, rebel operatives Luke Skywalker and Nakari Kelen were at a noodle shop to find Sakhet, a Kupohan who provided intelligence services. In order to indicate their intent of utilizing these services as opposed to merely buying food, the pair were to order the Corellian buckwheat noodles with rancor sauce. Skywalker and Kelen both found this idea to be repulsive, and were relieved when they were simply served nerf nuggets with their noodles instead.
Nerf nuggets first appeared in the 2015 novel Heir to the Jedi by Kevin Hearne.
